Present SQLSERVERORACLE DBA Responsibilities Worked with team of 4 in 247365 environment working oncall 247 for every three weeks handling over 150 requests per week in Service Now installing SQL Server 08R2 on windows clustered and standalone environments experience in working and troubleshooting Very large databases1TB in OLTP environment application support for front end feeds and resolved application connectivity issues like connection timeouts connection pooling issues like memory CPU and IO issues rebuilding and reorg of indexes for better performance Involved in data modeling for the application and created data models using Erwin data Modeler Analyze long running slow queries and tune the same to optimize application and system performance using SSMS and SQL SENTRY Setting up disaster recovery solutions like clustering and log shipping for high availability Implementation of SQL logins Roles and Authentication Modes as a part of security policies for various categories of users Configured backups maintenance plans backups optimization jobs and involved in restoring database to point in time in case of issues troubleshooting locks deadlocks and performance issues Configuring and deploying SSIS packages and SSRS reports Documenting procedures scripts incidents in OFFICE 365 NOTEBOOK ORACLE Administer and Monitor oracle databases 11g and 12C via Oracle Enterprise Manager Upgrade of 11g database to 12C using in place upgrade 247 oncall support for oracle databases Troubleshooting database performance by analyzing and tuning SQL queries finding fragmentation looking at reports and statistics Increase performance by rebuilding tables and indexes managing SGA Work with developers and system analyst to provide security via roles grants and privileges Backup and recovery via exportimport and RMAN Environment SQL Server 08 SSIS Oracle 10g 11g 12c Erwin Data Modeler OEM SENTRY ONE Power BI Visual Studio 2010 Database Administrator restoration recovery UserSchema Creation and maintenance Space Management Played a good role in setting up always on High availability SQL Server DBA Micron Technology Boise ID September 2012 to December 2014 Responsibilities Production supporting DBA activities in huge OLTP environments Analyzing and designing and implementing different types of Replication Models Supporting Huge Databases Troubleshooting the problems Spreading huge tables to different file groups to achieve maximum performance Writing TSQL code and complex stored procedures for different tasks Tuning the code written by team members to achieve optimum performance Always On 2012 to 2012 in windows clustering environments for High Availability Setting up monitoring alerts and dashboards in addition using of SQL builtin dashboards Discussion with peers about performance issues SQL Internals about log shipping DB mirroring replication etc MS SQL Server installation configuration performance tuning clientserver connectivity query optimization backuprecovery running Database Consistency Checks using DBCC Database creation restoration recovery UserSchema Creation and maintenance Space Management Monitoring and Troubleshooting SQL Server using Windows System Monitor creating an Alert in Windows System Monitor creating a SQL server Performance Alerts Data migration import export BCP from Text to SQL server Setting up High availability always on future on new 2012 servers Good understanding and experience in SQL Server 2008 features like Change Data Capture CDC Transparent Data Encryption TDE and Policy based Management Prepared and documented Backup Restore Plans and manage data import and export form multiagency interfaces Managed team of 6 DBAs on a 247 production support basis Supported Application Development team with any database issues updates or new releases Support included deadlock issues best practices in structuring SQL Queries debugging unexpected SQL results etc
